title: How to improve my intonation on fretless bass playing - Quora

response.answer_text: That a pretty vague question. Improve how? Assuming you understand time signatures and have a decent fretboard knowledge, all I can advise is to practice new material. Stretch out of your comfort zone and challenge yourself to go further. I’m a huge believer in using a metronome while practicing. The rest is just practice, practice and more practice.
